verbose_text: A more likely explanation is that DO has some critical role in fine tuning, or improving the antigenic peptide repertoire selection in collaboration with DM : the expression of DO in B cells could easily be explained by the need to limit the number of long lived memory T cells developed against different antigens, and in the thymus, DO contributes to the presentation of a repertoire that is most contrived yet effective permitting deletion of all possible self-reactive T cells.
